title: Stock Futures Edge Up; Tyson Foods, WeWork to Post Earnings
sub_head: Advance Auto Parts and Lucid Group will report results after the market closes
body:
U.S. stock futures rose, indicating that indexes would open with gains to start the week, while government bond yields fell.
Futures for the S&P 500 added 0.2% Monday. The broad market index finished last week with slim losses, snapping a five-week winning streak. Contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 rose 0.2% Monday and futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average were up 0.3%.
